system.sustained: Select Target Character and target device weighing no more than 2kg x Psy Rating and make Focus Power Test. If successful, permenantly integrate device into target's body, with target's mind gaining intuitive control over it. This process also removes 1d5+Psy Rating + 2 per Degree of Success Damage, but permenantly reduces target's Toughness and Fellowship Characteristics by 1d5.
